BlueLadder.NAME: Blue Ladder
DESCRIPTION: You may travel to any room beside you that your friends have visited #b
times.

StringOfFate.NAME: String Of Fate
DESCRIPTION: Neow ties the lives of your team together. Once all lives are gone your team is defeated. Lives can subtitute for keys to the Heart. NL NL Each life lost lowers Max HP by 25%.
Neow ties the lives of your team together. Once all lives are gone your team is defeated. Lives can subtitute for keys to the Heart. NL NL Each life lost past the first lowers Max HP by 20%.

BondsOfFate.NAME: Bonds Of Fate
DESCRIPTION: Replaces Strings of Fate and gain an extra life for each player. Lives can substitute for keys to the Heart. Each life lost adds a new Tombstone to your deck.

Tombstone.NAME: %s's Grave
DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Here lies %s, killed by %s. NL Exhaust.
misfortune

DimensionalWallet.NAME: Dimensional Wallet
DESCRIPTION: Your team shares #yGold. Gain 100 #yGold per player.

GhostWriter.NAME: Ghost Writer
DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of battle, shuffle up to #b2 rare cards from your teammates decks into your draw pile. Available cards:

DowsingRod.NAME: Dowsing Rod
DESCRIPTION: Buried nodes are more common and have more rest sites and treasure. Empty Rooms now contain enhanced combat rewards.

MirrorTouch.NAME: Mirror Touch
DESCRIPTION: Your team shares Health and Max Hp. Increase your Max Hp to half again your combined average #g(
). NL NL Max Health increases are halved.

PneumaticPost.NAME: Pneumatic Post
DESCRIPTION: You can reroll available items once per Courier. Cards sent by Courier are upgraded. NL NL Will never offer Cauldron or Orrery.

VaporFunnel.NAME: Vapor Funnel
DESCRIPTION: Your team shares Potions. You will have one potion slot per player, plus 2 slots, #g
slots in total. NL NL You will lose a potion slot for each penalty, including ascension, and gain one for each potion belt.

Dimensioneel.NAME: Dimensioneel
DESCRIPTION: Couriers now stock two random relics that don't come from your character.
Choose #b3 non-boss relics. These will be rerolled into a new relic of the same rarity and distributed to your teammates with the fewest relics.

BrainFreeze.NAME: Brain Freeze
DESCRIPTION: Start each combat by putting [E] into Brain Freeze. Click on Brain Freeze to gain [E] .

BigHouse.NAME: Big House
DESCRIPTION: Team Members with the lowest of each resource get a corresponding reward. Everyone will receive a card draft.
Big House!
NL NL %d Gold: %s NL Potion: %s NL Extra Card Draft: %s NL Card Removal: %s NL Relic: %s NL Upgrade: %s NL %d Max HP: %s

MessageInABottle.NAME: Message In A Bottle
DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, each teammate chooses a #yCard. This card is removed from your deck, and your teammates will start each combat with this card in their hand. NL NL If sent, Genetic Algorithm and Ritual Dagger will not be able to grow further.
Choose a card
You start each combat with these cards in your hand: NL NL

ChainsOfFate.NAME: Chains Of Fate
DESCRIPTION: Your team has combined lives. Lives can subtitute for keys to the Heart. NL NL Each life lost lowers Max HP by 25% and adds a new Tombstone to your deck.
Your team has combined lives. Lives can subtitute for keys to the Heart. NL NL Each life lost past the first lowers Max HP by 20% and adds a new Tombstone to your deck.

StrangeFlame.NAME: Strange Flame
DESCRIPTION: Enemies can be buffed like Elites. The first player to fight the boss will fight an extra difficult buffed Boss.
NL NL Slime Boss has 240 health.
NL NL The Guardian gains 2 Artifact and Buffer when they charge, and 10 thorns in Defensive Mode.
NL NL Hexaghost will add 3 Burns instead of 2, and they start upgraded.
NL NL Bronze Automaton's Orbs have 98 health and do 12 damage.
NL NL Champ gains increasing amounts of Block when you play cards.
NL NL When summoned, Torch Heads give 4 permanent Flame Barrier each to existing monsters.
NL NL Awakened One will Hex you when they are Reborn.
NL NL Time Eater reduces start of turn draws by one.
NL NL Donu and Deca will be Intangible on alternating turns.
NL NL The Heart will every Curse to your draw pile instead of Statuses.
Bulk Up
Each time you play a card, Champ gains Block equal to the amount of cards you've played.

BluntScissors.NAME: Blunt Scissors
DESCRIPTION: Instead of skipping card drafts, you can send and merge a card into a draftable cards for your friends.
NL NL #yQueued #yCards: NL
Send
Keep
Chosen card will be merged into friend's Card drafts
